definition: to giggle/to laugh foolishly/to smirk/to simper
to act stupid/to pretend to be naive
to play the fool (idiom)/to feign madness

sentences.english: I’m  wiser  than  to  believe  him.
sentences.chinese: 我还没傻到相信他的地步。

sentences.english: Looks that way(q14). You gonna open it or stick your thumb up your butt?
sentences.chinese: 你是想打开它还是在哪儿站着傻看？

sentences.english: You use words like "brainwashed" and"lemmings" to describe Apple fans.
sentences.chinese: 你用“脑残”和“傻X”去形容苹果粉丝。

sentences.english: You say, well, why are you doing something so foolish?
sentences.chinese: 你会说，你为什么在做那么傻的事啊？

sentences.english: She was prating of her responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 她唠唠叨叨地傻谈责任。

sentences.english: Now it's a stupid little function.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个有点傻的函数。

sentences.english: They are imbrued with the follies of youth.
sentences.chinese: 他们满脑子都是年轻人的傻念头。

sentences.english: Especially he, the silly child, we all could not go back.
sentences.chinese: 尤他，傻孩子，我们都回不去了。

sentences.english: He is not stupid as you thought, he just did that for laughs.
sentences.chinese: 他没你想的那么傻，他这么做只是图个乐。

sentences.english: Ichoate time , I Actually foolish foolish go believe you.
sentences.chinese: 刚开始的时候，我居然儍傻去相信祢。

sentences.english: It was just plain stupid to give him your address.
sentences.chinese: 你把你的地址告诉他，真是太傻了。

sentences.english: There are some things I really cannot read, is you're too fake, or I am silly.
sentences.chinese: 有些事我实在看不懂，是你演的太假，还是我本就傻。

sentences.english: Why do you allow such silly ideas to come into that head of hers?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么让这种傻念头钻到她那个怪脑袋里？

sentences.english: Don't run yourself silly and end up on the sideline instead of crossing the finish line.
sentences.chinese: 不要傻跑，别跑到马路边上去，您应该冲过终点线。

definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
to act stupid/to pretend to be naive
